channel.title: I really don't get it with this error
channel.description:
[i]hello since a i started with scar i get nothing els then errors meanwhile these are fixed but i can't sovle this one:[/i]
[i]this is in xMapWalker.scar[/i] 43 if (not (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color, xs, ys, xe, ye, tol))) then 44 begin 45 if (Lowercase(MoveDir) = 'n') or (Lowercase(MoveDir) = 'north') then 46 ye := ye + 10; 47 if (Lowercase(MoveDir) = 'e') or (Lowercase(MoveDir) = 'east') then 48 xs := xs - 10; 49 if (Lowercase(MoveDir) = 's') or (Lowercase(MoveDir) = 'south') then
[i]this is where it flips on [/i] ____________________________________________________________________________________________ [i]this the error [/i]
Failed when compiling Line 43: [Error] (16395:29): Unknown identifier 'x' in script C:\Program Files (x86)\SCAR 3.15\includes\SRL/SRL/Extended/xMapWalk.scar
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[i]can you guys help e out of this one ?
thx in advance[/i]

item.title: I really don't get it with this error
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

They’ve been removed from the new SRL.

You’ll need to find a new script.
try http://villavu.com/

Read full topic

item.title: I really don't get it with this error
item.dc:creator: @pm0250 pm0250
item.description:
@pm0250 wrote:

hello since a i started with scar i get nothing els then errors meanwhile these are fixed but i can’t sovle this one:

this is in xMapWalker.scar
43 if (not (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color, xs, ys, xe, ye, tol))) then
44 begin
45 if (Lowercase(MoveDir) = ‘n’) or (Lowercase(MoveDir) = ‘north’) then
46 ye := ye + 10;
47 if (Lowercase(MoveDir) = ‘e’) or (Lowercase(MoveDir) = ‘east’) then
48 xs := xs - 10;
49 if (Lowercase(MoveDir) = ‘s’) or (Lowercase(MoveDir) = ‘south’) then

this is where it flips on

this the error

Failed when compiling
Line 43: [Error] (16395:29): Unknown identifier ‘x’ in script C:\Program Files (x86)\SCAR 3.15\includes\SRL/SRL/Extended/xMapWalk.scar

[i]can you guys help e out of this one ?

thx in advance[/i]

Read full topic
